title: Rural population share in France 2006 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of the rural population. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
In general Share of the rural population has fallen over the Year.
Share of the rural population is slightly decreasing from 2006 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Share of the rural population, about 22.6 was reported at Year 2006
Minimum Share of the rural population about 19.5 was reached at Year 2018
